Articles.Content: Did I miss something core, or did subassemblies get removed from career mode entirely? I'd been thinking they were gated behind the final VAB upgrade or something, but nope...

Just checked, they are available in the VAB from tier 0.

But you have to click on the top left arrow labeled "Enable Advanced Mode", and the subassemblies will show up when clicking on the green-rocket icon.
Yeah, figured I was missing something important. Thanks.
